name: Kaizen! We are flying ✈️ with Adam & Jerod (Ship It! #50)
summary: This is our 5th Kaizen where we talk about the next improvement to changelog.com: we are now running on fly.io and our PostgreSQL is managed. This is a migration that many were curious about, including Simey de Klerk, the person that requested this episode. After migrating all our media files to AWS S3 (check episode 4...
